Replace.Text: Area is about 1.36 million square kilometers

[Animal Husbandry] technology unlocks the right to build military camps. Cities with less than 3 [ICON_Citizen] population maintain [ICON_PressureUp] loyalty. [NEWLINE]Allows your non-capital cities to run special projects to establish [ICON_Capital] new capitals, and +1 [ICON_Citizen] population for the capital, and gain one [ICON_Unit] ranged unit each time you establish [ICON_Capital] capital. [NEWLINE]Non-capital cities you establish -100% [ICON_Buildings] city development speed. The Municipal Plaza and its buildings each give all cities +25% [ICON_Buildings] city development speed. [NEWLINE]Have the special governor [Old Priest] Wuyun Dalau.
With the unique governor [Old Priest] Wuyun Dalao, he can provide you with a good strategic environment. And initially provides 1 [ICON_Governor] governor title
The special long-range unit of Arkatan is unlocked by [Gunpowder] and can be upgraded to [Field Cannon]. [NEWLINE]Range [ICON_Range] 2, [ICON_Movement] after attack.

A characteristic building of Rakhatan, which replaces [Stables], does not provide great man points, has a lower cost, and [Animal Husbandry] is unlocked. [NEWLINE] Provides 1 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] horse strategic resource each turn. [NEWLINE] Light cavalry units trained in this city +1 level [ICON_Promotion] Promotion

Feature projects that can be carried out in up to 2 cities you build. Upon completion, move the [ICON_Capital] capital to this city and gain 1 [ICON_Citizen] population in the [ICON_Capital] capital. [NEWLINE]If 2 cities complete this project at the same time, the latter will be selected as the [ICON_Capital] capital based on the order in which the cities were established.
Wuyun Darao can provide you with a good strategic environment.

After taking office, each round provides +3 points for unlocked but not improved strategic resources. [NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_Production] productivity when producing units that require strategic resources in this city.

After taking office, whenever a capital is established, road links will be established between friendly cities within its trade range and the current [ICON_Capital] capital. The newly created city has a separate road link with the [ICON_Capital] capital. [NEWLINE]+50% [ICON_Production] productivity when producing builders, merchants, or military engineers in this city.
Dark Cloud's Trailer: When moving [ICON_Movement] ignores the obstacles of terrain and landforms
Dark Cloud's Trailer: When moving [ICON_Movement] ignores the obstacles of terrain and landforms

After taking office, you immediately establish a trading post in the target city when establishing a trade route. [NEWLINE]Civilian units trained in the inaugural city [ICON_Movement] ignore terrain and terrain obstacles when moving.
After taking office, all governor-general cities have +4 [ICON_Housing] housing +2 [ICON_AMENITIES] amenity, and the construction of specialized areas ignores population.
Including newly acquired cities, all cities receive a free city center building, and the number stacks with the number of inaugurations.
Land combat units trained in the inaugural city receive 100% [ICON_Gold] gold coins from the combat effectiveness of defeated units.
Dark Cloud's Promise: Earn 100% [ICON_Gold] gold coins from the combat power of defeated units
Dark Cloud's Promise: Earn 100% [ICON_Gold] gold coins from the combat power of defeated units
Collecting salary and dying in winter
Will actively expand. [NEWLINE] Prefers civilizations that maintain long-term peace, and dislikes civilizations that wage long-term wars. Favorability changes with duration.
Jingniu Shuoting prefers a mild solution.
Jingniu Shuoting is dissatisfied that you still haven't closed the issue.

Calm down and feel the breath of nature, and this sacred land under the peaceful sky will open to you. Jingniu Shuoting, you have a sworn brother who is sympathetic to you, and a respected wise man who is willing to pave the way for you with all his heart. Respect traditions, move with the seasons, establish tribal territories one after another, and connect them with trade networks. A stable and united tribe will never be eliminated by the times!

+1 [ICON_Production] Production for all cities for every city with full Loyalty and at least 1 Specialized District. Gain 1 [ICON_Unit] Settler for building a [ICON_Capital] Primitive Capital. [NEWLINE]Build a Trade Post immediately in the acquired city, +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every Trade Post that passes through your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route.
The eagle does not hide from the storm, and the wolves do not fear from the long night.
Compared to his sworn brothers, Jingniu Shuoting is known for his steady acting style.

Rakhatan is different from regular civilizations. Only the [ICON_Citizen] population in the [ICON_Capital] capital can grow normally and naturally. Through the project, Rakhatan can immediately move the capital and gain a population in the capital. This means they are able to trade [ICON_Production] productivity for [ICON_Citizen] population. [NEWLINE]The special governor Wuyun Darao can solve the problem of almost no natural growth in non-capital cities to a certain extent. [NEWLINE] At the same time, moving the capital to Arkatan can also obtain [ICON_Unit] remote units, which is very beneficial to supplement the combat power. The loyalty of cities with a population of less than 3 is also equivalent to the city-state's bonus. This bonus is also effective for conquered cities, so Raqatan is undoubtedly a civilization that is quite good at conquering. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Jingniu Shuoting initially has an extra pioneer, which makes his development speed very fast and can carry out the capital relocation project earlier. At the same time, the more cities he controls, the more he can obtain considerable [ICON_Culture] cultural value through trade routes. [NEWLINE] As an AI, although Jingniu Shuoting prefers peace, he will not hesitate to declare a war of revenge, a war to regain lost territory, and a war to defend the city-state. He is a very vengeful leader. However, the priority of Ai running projects is very low, so there is basically no need to worry about Ai becoming too difficult.

Raqatan exchanges [ICON_Production] productivity for [ICON_Citizen] population, and the special governor can also provide it with considerable benefits. You can consider using spies to carry out [Framing the Governor], targeting the special Governor of Rakhatan. [NEWLINE]However, when Rakhatan moves its capital, it will gain additional [ICON_Unit] ranged units, and their combat effectiveness on paper cannot be underestimated. [NEWLINE] Since the loyalty bonus is too high, it will be difficult to solve the Raqatan problem by force. You can consider religious victory over it.
I am Jingniu Shuoting of Lakhatan. Although I don't like this name very much, I have made peace with it. You can just call me that.
As a mark of respect, I invite you to be our guest in one of our nearby settlements. We may have considerable ideological differences, but this will not be a disaster for today's celebration.
Thank you, I'll check it out.
Our capital is constantly changing, so I think we should exchange the location of our capital now to save your envoys from being too busy.
To the more traditional Lakhata people, you are showing off your wealth maliciously... maybe you should change your time.
We got way more revenue than we needed this year and I thought you might just be interested in this?
Please make good use of these disrespectful little gifts...
Please let us establish an embassy to facilitate the handling of diplomatic matters between our two countries.
Well, I'll allow your people to pass.
Please allow us to pass through your land, it is important.
Traditionally, we're supposed to smoke the same pipe or something...but now we can drink from the same bottle of wine instead - and rest assured, it's a separate meal.
Your proposal comes a bit suddenly, let me think about it for a while...
Please establish a relationship of friendship with us. We should have a reason to rely on each other and work together.
Unexpectedly, I still misjudged the situation...?
Our friendship should go even further - please form an alliance with us!
I believe that most of the frictions that arise between us can be resolved safely.
You'd better resolve the conflict between you as soon as possible. My patience is limited...
Your warriors have caused quite a bit of conflict on our borders... If this is what you mean, then don't engage in these petty actions!
So let’s talk about it next time.
So, do you have a better solution? You say it, and I listen, but you are not qualified to interfere in our internal affairs.
It seems like I should have a hand in your affairs? [NEWLINE](condemn you)
It seems that I acted too gently and awakened the wolf in your heart?
I'm happy to be gentle, but I can't waste any more time on you.
Maybe there won't be a future.
This land belongs to all Rakhatan people, and I will not give in.
The souls of the deceased are flying freely, flying to the sky of sincere sadness... Everything has passed, but I can't restore anything. I can't forgive them...
The souls of the deceased are flying freely, flying to the sky of sincere sadness... Everything has passed, but I can't restore anything. I can't forgive them...

Will actively expand. [NEWLINE]Want to challenge civilizations with large military forces, and dislike civilizations that attack city-states. Sympathize with civilizations with weak military forces, and like to protect city-states.
Your military force is too weak. Don't try to take the lead in many things. I will take care of it.
Crazy Horse Kuichi is kind to the weak.
Ha, what a magnificent army with strong soldiers and horses. I look forward to fighting with you...
Crazy horse Kuichi wants to challenge the strong.

Burn, answer the call of nature, and roam freely in this wild world. Crazy horse Kuichi, you have a sworn brother who is sympathetic to you, and a respected wise man who is willing to pave the way for you. Show your pride and you will make more friends who are willing to help you. Then your impassioned singing will reach the sky and will last until death!

Allows the training of Barbarian Riders and Barbarian Archers, and gains an [ICON_Unit] Light Cavalry unit whenever a [ICON_Capital] capital is established. [NEWLINE]Units escorted by a light cavalry unit enjoy the [ICON_Movement] movement ability of that light cavalry unit. [ICON_Turn] time to build barracks is halved. [NEWLINE]When a foreign city owns your trading post, you gain +1 [ICON_VisSecret] diplomatic visibility to that city's civilization.
This land is the land where I will be laid to rest, and it will also be the land where you and I will be buried together. Come, let us die with honor!
Compared to his sworn brothers, Kuangma Kuichi is known for his eagerness for justice and justice.

Rakhatan is different from regular civilizations. Only the [ICON_Citizen] population in the [ICON_Capital] capital can grow normally and naturally. Through the project, Rakhatan can immediately move the capital and gain a population in the capital. This means they are able to trade [ICON_Production] productivity for [ICON_Citizen] population. [NEWLINE]The special governor Wuyun Darao can solve the problem of almost no natural growth in non-capital cities to a certain extent. [NEWLINE] At the same time, moving the capital to Arkatan can also obtain [ICON_Unit] remote units, which is very beneficial to supplement the combat power. The loyalty of cities with a population of less than 3 is also equivalent to the city-state's bonus. This bonus is also effective for conquered cities, so Raqatan is undoubtedly a civilization that is quite good at conquering. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Kui Chi can get an additional [ICON_Unit] light cavalry unit on top of this. It also allows you to train Barbarian Riders and Barbarian Archers, and gain additional [ICON_VisSecret] diplomatic visibility from foreign trading posts. [NEWLINE] As an AI, Crazy Horse Kuichi is hostile to civilizations with strong military power, and will not hesitate to declare wars of revenge, wars to regain lost territories, and wars to defend city-states. He is a very vengeful leader. However, the priority of Ai running projects is very low, so there is basically no need to worry about Ai becoming too difficult.

Raqatan exchanges [ICON_Production] productivity for [ICON_Citizen] population, and the special governor can also provide it with considerable benefits. You can consider using spies to carry out [Framing the Governor], targeting the special Governor of Rakhatan. [NEWLINE]However, when Rakhatan moves its capital, it will gain additional [ICON_Unit] units, and their combat effectiveness on paper cannot be underestimated. [NEWLINE] Since the loyalty bonus is too high, it will be difficult to solve the Raqatan problem by force. You can consider religious victory over it.
I am the Crazy Horse of Rakatan, Kuichi. Do you think this is not my name? I think so too, but it is not important.
Anyone who comes is a guest, why don't you come with me to visit a nearby settlement? We can have a drink together.
What are you waiting for? Set off!
Let's exchange the location of the capital so that we can contact you next time?
Thank you for your generosity, it is very helpful to us.
Go back with your so-called gifts. Do you really think we lack this thing from you?
This year's harvest is very abundant. Although no one would complain that the harvest is too much, it would be great if it can help others... So, will you accept these?
Great, let’s have a party to celebrate! .
Forget it, we'll find other people who need it.
It's time to formalize diplomacy between us. Let's build an embassy.
Excellent, let’s have a feast to celebrate! Our treat!
You may think it's best to maintain the status quo, but it also shows that you don't take me seriously...
Ha, such a small thing... please.
This isn't going to work, man.
I am Crazy Horse Kuichi! We need to pass through your land to do some business, please open the border for us!
Very good! Come and drink this bottle of wine with me quickly!
Haha, don't worry, it will happen one day.
Drink this bottle of wine with me, and we will be good brothers!
Very good! If one bottle isn't enough, we'll have a drink at the banquet!
oh? Is my wine not delicious enough, or do you look down on me?
Come and form an alliance with us, you and I both need a brother to shoulder our burdens with!
Very good! I can't stand those bastards who bully the weak! .
Bullying? You must also agree that you were bullied by someone stronger, right?
Take action when it's time to take action! I admire your approach.
They regard you as their suzerain country, but you have failed to live up to your promise to them.
Want to start a war? Okay, let's do some hand gestures? !
Can't reach an agreement? never mind.
So brave! When will we fight? !
Humph, when I think about getting along with an insect like you, I can't even drink! [NEWLINE](condemn you)
I'm really excited to be able to fight with you.
I am never afraid of challenges, and I am even excited about them.
Ha, I haven’t reached my limit yet!
I'm defeated, I admit defeat, let's stop.
The wild horse is riding the southward tornado and breaks into my dream again. Unfortunately, I no longer have the chance to ride around the world with it...
The wild horse rode the tornado heading south and broke into my dreams again. It’s a pity that I no longer have the chance to gallop around the world with it...
